video.loadError: An error occurred while trying to load the video

warnings.noInternet: No internet connection - no login - no videos. Nothing at all.
warnings.minLength: Minimal length not reached, should be at least

general.title: Oops, something went wrong
general.contact: If the problem persists, please contact support

network.noConnectionDescription: Check your internet connection and try again
network.timeoutDescription: The server is taking too long to respond. Please try again later

video.unavailableDescription: The video you're trying to watch cannot be played. Try selecting another video or refresh the page

page.notFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist at this address

api.keyMissingDescription: The application is not properly configured. Please contact support
api.rateLimitedDescription: Please wait a moment before trying again
